Description.p: Assigned OID: the OID for the UK subset of SnomedCT, q.v.
Codes taken from the UK subset of SnomedCT representing that administration of a medication should be continued (typically following a medication review).
A code of TBA indicates that the SnCT code is not yet available.
+ after a code indicates that descendants of the code shall be used.

concept.displayName: administration of therapeutic substance (procedure). This concept shall be context modified as a procedure by setting the value of the procedure context attribute (408730004) with the value: code TBA continue to use (qualifier value
